gurmukhi: dIpk pqMg imil jrq n rwiK skY jry mry Awgy n prmpd pwey hY
transliteration: Deepak Patang Mili Jarat N Raakhi Sakai , Jaray Maray Aagay N Paramapad Paaay Hai ?
translation: Coming near the flame of oil lamp, the lamp cannot save the moth from burning. This type of death cannot provide salvation in the world beyond.

gurmukhi: mDup kml imil BRmq n rwiK skY sMpt mY mUey sY n shj smwey hY
transliteration: Madhoup Kamal Mili Bhramat N Raakhi Sakai , Sanpat Mai Mooay Sai N Sahaj Samaaay Hai ?
translation: A lotus flower cannot stop a black bee from visiting other flowers. So, if a black bee gets shut up in the box of lotus petals when the Sun sets, it cannot merge with Lord Almighty.

gurmukhi: jl imil mIn kI n duibDw imtwie skI ibCuir mrq hir lok n pTwey hY
transliteration: Jal Mili Meen Kee N Doubidhaa Mitaai Sakee , Bichhuri Marat Hari Lok N Patthaaay Hai ?
translation: Separating from water, the pain suffered by a fish cannot be removed by water. Thus, a death of this type cannot land the fish in heaven.

gurmukhi: ieq auq sMgm shweI suKdweI gur igAwn iDAwn pRym rs AOmiRq pIAwey hY ]320]
transliteration: It Out Sangam Sahaaee Soukhadaaee Gur , Giaan Dhiaan Praym Ras Aoumrit Peeaaay Hai ?320?
translation: Meeting the True Guru provides support and assistance in this world and the world beyond. Such a love is the outcome of contemplation and meditation on the teachings and consecration of the True Guru. It fills the Sikh with elixir-like love of the True Gu
